t:parameter.name: NetworkTimeout
t:parameter.description: Timeout for blocking network calls (in seconds). Use -1 for no timeout.

t:parameter.name: TargetIp
t:parameter.description: Target IP Address

t:parameter.name: TargetPort
t:parameter.description: Port used by the SMB service

t:parameter.name: RedirectedTargetIp
t:parameter.description: Physical (redirected) target IP

t:parameter.name: RedirectedTargetPort
t:parameter.description: Physical (redirected) target port

t:parameter.name: Pipe
t:parameter.description: Test an additional pipe to see if it is accessible (optional)

t:parameter.name: Share
t:parameter.description: Test a file share to see if it is accessible (optional), entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

t:parameter.name: UsingNbt
t:parameter.description: Boolean stating to use Nbt or not

t:parameter.name: UsingNbt
t:parameter.description: Boolean stating to use Nbt or not

t:paramgroup.name: Blank
t:paramgroup.description: User account with no password set

t:parameter.name: Username
t:parameter.description: Username entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

t:parameter.name: Username
t:parameter.description: Username entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

t:parameter.name: Password
t:parameter.description: Password entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

t:parameter.name: Username
t:parameter.description: Username entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

t:parameter.name: NtlmHash
t:parameter.description: NTLM password hash (in hex)

t:parameter.name: Target
t:parameter.description: Operating System, Service Pack, of Target OS

t:parameter.name: TargetOsArchitecture
t:parameter.description: Target architecture

t:parameter.name: PipeName
t:parameter.description: Pipe available to use

t:parameter.name: ShareName
t:parameter.description: Share available to use

t:parameter.name: Protocol
t:parameter.description: SMB or NBT

t:parameter.name: Credentials
t:parameter.description: The architecture of the target operating system

t:parameter.name: Username
t:parameter.description: Username entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

t:parameter.name: Password
t:parameter.description: Password entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

t:parameter.name: NtlmHash
t:parameter.description: NTLM password hash (in hex)
